results.name: Binomial transform of (-1)^mod(n,3) (A257075).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,2).
formula: a(n+3)/2 = A024495(n+2). - corrected by _Vladimir Shevelev_, Aug 08 2017
a(n) = A024495(n) if and only if n == 1 (mod 3);
a(n) = A024495(n) - 1 if and only if n == 2 or 3 (mod 6);
a(n) = A024495(n) + 1 if and only if n == 0 or 5 (mod 6);
